TextBlock.Text: The part of the Dree will be to commune with the <color=purple>Bramble</color>, to convince it to grow a distant node that will bring us to our destination. To do this, the <color=purple>Bramble</color> will be primed for communion, and the Dree themselves will attempt to attune themselves to the signal left behind by the <color=orange>Eye</color>.
This will be the carrier that allows the gate to function.
